 CxList inputs = Find_Interactive_Inputs();
CxList decode = All.FindByName("*Server.HtmlDecode").DataInfluencedBy(inputs);

CxList sanitize = Find_SQL_Sanitize();
CxList db = Find_DB();

result = db.InfluencedByAndNotSanitized(decode, sanitize);
